text:
Hi all! Is there a way to add meta keywords to our website and blog pages?
I have been advised to add tags to our blog pages, but they don’t show up when I crawl the website on Screaming Frog and in any case it’s not possible to add tags to regular webpages and landing pages.

It is under Settings --> Advanced. Just add it to the head code.  If you added it and it’s not showing up best thing I can recommend is to share a link to see if we can help you troubleshoot, or you may need to reach out to screaming frog if they are not picking it up in their crawls.
